crf:parameter.name: StartMonth
EndMonth
OwnerList
crf:parameter.crf:query:
SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT r.ResourceID AS ValueField, r.RName AS TextField FROM WTCRFResources r JOIN view_ResourceOptions ro ON ro.ResourceID = r.ResourceID WHERE r.RResourceType = 1016 -- CRF Sites AND r.ResourceID IN ( SELECT ro.ResourceID FROM view_ResourceOptions ro WHERE ROTValue = 'OWNER' ) ;

crf:query.name: owners
resources
resource_dates
merge_events_to_periods
resource_day_minutes
site_totals
crf:query.crf:statement:
SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT o.name AS site_name, SUM(other_in_hours_minutes) AS other_in_hours_minutes, SUM(patient_ooh_minutes) AS patient_ooh_minutes, SUM(patient_in_hours_minutes) AS patient_in_hours_minutes, SUM(core_minutes) AS core_minutes FROM #owners o JOIN #resources r ON r.owner_id = o.id JOIN #resource_day_minutes rdm ON rdm.resource_id = r.id GROUP BY o.name ;

crf:query.name: resource_totals
crf:query.crf:statement:
SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT o.name AS site_name, r.name AS resource_name, SUM(other_in_hours_minutes) AS other_in_hours_minutes, SUM(patient_ooh_minutes) AS patient_ooh_minutes, SUM(patient_in_hours_minutes) AS patient_in_hours_minutes, SUM(core_minutes) AS core_minutes FROM #owners o JOIN #resources r ON r.owner_id = o.id JOIN #resource_day_minutes rdm ON rdm.resource_id = r.id GROUP BY o.name, r.name ;

crf:query.name: day_totals
crf:query.crf:statement:
SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT day_of_week, SUM(other_in_hours_minutes) AS other_in_hours_minutes, SUM(patient_ooh_minutes) AS patient_ooh_minutes, SUM(patient_in_hours_minutes) AS patient_in_hours_minutes, SUM(core_minutes) AS core_minutes FROM #owners o JOIN #resources r ON r.owner_id = o.id JOIN #resource_day_minutes rdm ON rdm.resource_id = r.id GROUP BY day_of_week ;

crf:query.name: resource_date_totals
crf:query.crf:statement:
SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT resource_id, today, tomorrow, day_of_week, is_weekend, core_start_date_time, core_end_date_time, core_minutes FROM #resource_dates ;
